tit.j: 京都市中央卸売市場第二市場
tit.e: The second central wholesale market of Kyoto City
The second central wholesale market of Kyoto City
The second central wholesale market of Kyoto City

sen.j: 京都市中央卸売市場第二市場（きょうとしちゅうおうおろしうりしじょうだいにしじょう）は、京都市にある食肉専門の中央卸売市場。
sen.e: The second central wholesale market of Kyoto City is specialized for meat.
The second central wholesale market of Kyoto City is specialized in meat.
The second central wholesale market of Kyoto City is specialized in meat.

sen.j: 中央卸売市場法（現：卸売市場法）に基づき、南区吉祥院石原東之口に1969年に開設された。
sen.e: The market was established in 1969 in Kisshoin Ishihara Higashinokuchi, Minami Ward, based on the central wholsale market law (the present wholesale market law).
The market was established in 1969 in Kisshoin Ishihara Higashinokuchi, Minami Ward, based on the central wholesale market law (the present wholesale market law).
The market was established in 1969 in Kisshoin Ishihara Higashinokuchi, Minami Ward, based on the central wholesale market law (the present wholesale market law).

sen.j: 第二市場は，京都市とその周辺における食肉流通を担う目的で開設された。
sen.e: The second market was established for playing the role of distributing meat in Kyoto City and in areas around it.
The second market was established for playing the role of distributing meat in Kyoto City and in the surrounding areas.
The second market was established for playing the role of distributing meat in Kyoto City and in the surrounding areas.

sen.j: 屠殺場が併設されているため、生産地から運ばれてきた牛・豚などをそこで解体した後に、せりが行われている。
sen.e: With a slaughter facility being provided in the same site, the cattle and pigs conveyed there from the places where they have been raised are sectioned and auctioned.
With a slaughter facility being provided at the same site, cattle and pigs conveyed there from the places where they have been raised are sectioned and auctioned.
With a slaughter facility being provided at the same site, cattle and pigs conveyed there from the places where they have been raised are sectioned and auctioned.

sen.j: 取扱高（平成17年度） 76億3334万円
sen.e: The amount of transactions (in in the fiscal 2005): \7.63334 billions
The amount of transactions (in fiscal 2005): \7.63334 billion
The amount of transactions (in fiscal year 2005): \7.63334 billion
The number of cattle handled: 7,748
The number of cattle handled: 7,748
The number of cattle handled: 7,648
The number of pigs handled: 15,425
The number of pigs handled: 15,425
The number of pigs handled: 15,425
